ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNULL( Gift_through_dealer_amount__c ) ) , NOT( ISNULL( Gift_through_dealer_amount_p__c ) ), ISNULL( Payout_Cap__c ), ISPICKVAL(Product__c, 'Two Wheeler'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter either Gift through dealer Amount % or amt and not both in scheme
